ComicInfo.Title: Fantasy?; One Sunny Mid-Day in the Sahara; Cracked Rock Star Cars; Tales My Unca Gran'pa Told Me; When Old Age Finally Hits Monsterdom; Butting Heads; One-Shots; Garbage Dump Pop Stars; One Menza-Menaza Day in October; Freddy's Celebrity Nightmares!; The First Proposal; How the West Was Lost; Ninja; Form & Function Looks at Scuba Gear; Quentin Plasma's Lifeform; Dull House; Pre-Hystericals; Weird Fun; Cracked Coloring Pages; One Fine Day in a Learning Lab; Spaced Out
ComicInfo.Summary:
A caveman performs the first proposal. But in the end he settles for clubbing his intended over the head.
A ninja uses the restroom.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:36:29. [Issue ID 250601]
